<!-- Leaflet.js styles and script -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/leaflet@1.9.3/dist/leaflet.css" />
<script src="https://unpkg.com/leaflet@1.9.3/dist/leaflet.js"></script>

<script>
  // Create the map
  const map = L.map('map').setView([20, 0], 2); // World view

  // Add OpenStreetMap tiles
  L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
    attribution: '&copy; OpenStreetMap contributors'
  }).addTo(map);

  // Define markers
  const markers = [
    { place: "Pico da Bandeira", lat: -20.44, lon: -41.79 },
    { place: "Bergen", lat: 60.39, lon: 5.32 },
    { place: "Finse", lat: 60.60, lon: 7.51 },
    { place: "Nordfjord", lat: 61.92, lon: 6.72 },
    { place: "Azores", lat: 37.74, lon: -25.67 },
    { place: "Tapado Glacier", lat: -30.13, lon: -69.89 },
    { place: "Prague", lat: 50.0755, lon: 14.4378 }
    { place: "SÃ£o Paulo", lat: -23.55, lon: -46.63 }
  ];

  // Add markers to map
  markers.forEach(({ place, lat, lon }) => {
    L.marker([lat, lon]).addTo(map).bindPopup(`<strong>${place}</strong>`);
  });
</script>
